choiceresponse.p: The update tool allows dates to be set in the future and in the past. It also allows for multiple separate updates to be added. Imagine your update section has 4 separate updates listed with the dates as outlined below. Today is 1st September 2019.
choiceresponse.label: Which update(s) will be visible to new learners that sign up today?

div.p: The one from August is the only one that's in your visibility window: the time has passed, but it's not more than 3 weeks in the past.
